issue.title: [Packaging][Documentation] Comments out of date in python/manylinux1/build_arrow.sh
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5522](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5522). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The script has this comment:
```java

# Usage:
#   docker run --rm -v $PWD:/io arrow-base-x86_64 /io/build_arrow.sh
```

However, I get:
```Java

Unable to find image 'arrow-base-x86_64:latest' locally
docker: Error response from daemon: pull access denied for arrow-base-x86_64, repository does not exist or may require 'docker login'.
See 'docker run --help'.
```
